mapper.insert:
insert into t_g_project_status
id,
project_code,
current_status,
process_rate,
operate_staff,
create_time,
update_time,
finish_time,
result_info,
profile,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{currentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{processRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operateStaff,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{resultInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.sql: id ,project_code as projectCode ,current_status as currentStatus ,process_rate as processRate ,operate_staff as operateStaff ,create_time as createTime , update_time as updateTime ,finish_time as finishTime ,result_info as resultInfo ,profile
mapper.select:
select
from t_g_project_status where project_code = #{projectCode} and operate_staff = #{operateStaff} and profile = #{profile}
mapper.update:
update t_g_project_status set
current_status = #{currentStatus},
process_rate = #{processRate},
update_time = #{updateTime},
finish_time = #{finishTime},
result_info = #{resultInfo},
where id = #{id}
